text: 240px ' (August 24, 1795 – October 8, 1859) was a Japanese daimyō of the Edo period, who ruled the Tokushima Domain. His court title was Awa no kami. ==Family== * Father: Hachisuka Haruaki * Mother: Tsuyo no Kata * Wives: ** Jouhime (1792-1820) daughter of Ii Naonaka ** Takatsukasa Tsuneko (1799-1837) daughter of Takatsukasa Masahiro (adopting Hachisuka Narihiro and Hachisuka Kazuko) * Concubines: ** Miyake-dono ** Koda-dono ==Ancestry== ==References== Category:1795 births Category:1859 deaths Category:Hachisuka clan Category:Tozama daimyo
title: Hachisuka Narimasa
